title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 8 ) Order, 2020
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 695
Gazette dated Friday, 11th Decmber, 2020
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 101 OF 2020
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 8)
Order, 2020
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the Electoral
Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 8)
Order, 2020.
2. A candidate for election as a councillor in a district and Date and
time of
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the
nomination
returning officer on Wednesday, 23rd December, 2020, between for election
0900 hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Wednesday, 23rd Campaign
period
December, 2020, at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on Sunday,
3rd January, 2021.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a councillor in a district and Election date
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Monday, 4th January, and time of
poll
2021, between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district and ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K 4.00 each
464 Statutory Instruments 25th September, 2020
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs 2 and 4)
ELECTIONS FOR COUNCILLOR
District Constituency Ward No. Name
Lumezi Lumezi 103004014 Kamimba
Kasempa Kasempa 108004009 Kaimbwe
Livingstone Livingstone 109006009 Maramba
Kalabo Liuwa 110001015 Luola
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this 7th day of
December, 2020.
JUSTICE E. E. CHULU,
Chairperson
E. J. SIKAZWE,
Member
A. D. SIMWINGA,
Member
V. M. MUKANTA,
Member
LUSAKA
7th December, 2020
[EC.101/5/5 CONF.]
